name: Maze_1.1
description:
Guide the ball to the exit, very easy and colorful!

First two levels are pretty basic, but be ready for the real challenge! 

Final Level: THE FLOOR IS LAVA!

Try to get to the green cube without touching the ground. Some bridges will help you "jump" over to the next platform or just get you across. Look closely, some platforms are higher, therefore you can roll to the lower ones. You have one try, so good luck.
